item.title: How to add npc?
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Dont make spamming polls.

[quote=“lamename5, post:2, topic:225447”]go to autospawn.cfg in your server files, find
the NpcId you want to add to the server, if you can’t
find the id, just change another npc’s id to it, and change
the coords to where you want it to be. :P[/quote]

Npc ids can be located at www.moparisthebest.com, there is a client with some tabs up the top.

Read full topic
